titleStmt.title: SII 7.156: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 156. (A.R. No. 142 of 1900). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumakaḷ polap perunilaccelviyu n=ta
ṉakke yurimai pūṇṭamai maṉakkoḷak kān=taḷūrccālai
kalamaṟuttaruḷi veṅkaināṭuṅ kaṅkapāṭiyun taṭikaipāṭiyu
m nuḷampapāṭiyum kuṭamalaināṭuṅ kollamuṅ kaliṅkamum
Eṇṭicai pukaḻtara Īḻamaṇṭalamum tiṇṭiṟal veṉṟi
taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa taṉṉeḻil vaḷaruḻiyu ḷellā yā
ṇṭun toḻuteḻa viḷaṅkum yāṇṭe ceḻiyarait tecu
koḷ śrīkovirājarāja rājakecaripanmaṟki yāṇṭu 10 8Ā
Āvatu coṇāṭṭut teṉkarai Ārkkāṭṭukkūṟṟattup perarai
cūruṭaiyāṉ Āruraṉ Utaiyutivākaranāṉa Arumoḻi mu
ventaveḷāṉ piṟantanāḷ makattināṉṟu Oymānāṭ
ṭuk kiṭakkaināṭṭuk kiṭaṅkil tiruttiṇṭiśvaramuṭaiya mahaātevaṟku snapanam nūṟṟeṭṭuk kalaca māṭiyaruḷuvatukkut teṉānāḻiyum ney nāṉāḻiyum pāl nāṉāḻiyum tayir nāṉāḻiyum taruppaṇa nāṉāḻiyum Eḷḷu nāṉāḻi
yum kaṭuku nāṉāḻiyum mañcaṭpoṭi nāṉāḻiyun torai Uṭpaṭa snapanattravyaṅka ḷuttamappaṭi veṇṭuvatukkum Ācārjyabhūcaikkum puṭavaikkum sapanamāṭit tiruvamirtu ceyyat tiruvamutuArici tūṇikkum kaṟiyamutu nālukkum neyamutu Urikku n=tayiramutu Irunāḻikkum A
ṭaikkāyamutukkum Uṭpaṭa makattiṉāṉṟu snapanam Oṉṟinukku nellup pannirukalane tūṇippatakkāka Orāṇṭu panniraṇṭu tiṅkaḷilum panniraṇṭu makattukkum peruntiruvamutukkumāka nellu nūṟṟaimpatin kalattukkuk kiṭaṅkil pāppanappaṭṭiyuṭaiya kirāñci
kāmakkoṭakkiramavittaniṭai vilaikkuk koṇṭu kuṭutta nilam caṭaiyanārpaṭṭiyeṉṟu perkūvappaṭum muṉṟupaṭṭi nilattukkum kiḻpāṟkellai Ivvūr Iṟaiyāṉkoyilāḻvārkku śrīpalikoṭṭum Uvaccarkaḷ nilattukku merkku n=teṉpāṟkellai Ivvuvaccarkaḷ nilattukkup pāyn=ta kā
lukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai vativāykkālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai mallan parāyatanum naṭuviṟcerik kaṭampuḻārkaḷum Uḷḷiṭṭār nilattukkut teṟku Āka Ivvicaitta perunānkellaiyilum Akappaṭṭa pāppanappaṭṭi muṉṟupaṭṭi nilamum mikutik kuṟaimai Uḷḷaṭaṅ
kap pāppanappaṭṭi muṉṟupaṭṭi nilamum Innilamuṭaiya kirāñcik kāmakkoṭakkirama
vittaniṭai vilaiyaṟak koṇṭu poruḷaṟak kuṭuttu Ārura nutaiyativākaranāṉa Arumoḻi
muventaveḷār koṇṭu tantamaiyil tiruttiṇṭiśvaramuṭaiya tiruvuṇṇāḻikai śiva
braāhmaṇarome Ippāppaṉappaṭṭiyāl munpuḷḷa pūrvvasiddhāyam paṭṭikkālum paṭṭikkāṭiyu
m nāṅkaḷey Iṟuttukkoṇṭu Innivantappaṭi tiṅkaḷtoṟum muṭṭāmai ceyvomānom .
Digital edition of SII 7.156 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
